project_descr: Fiji Good Governance Programme - Component 3 - National Initiiative on Civic Education.  This project is designed to facilitate civic rights awareness and information on national governance, civic responsibility etc. in the Fiji population at large

outputs.output_descr: The project works with civil society organizations and other influential special interest groups in developing a community civic education curriculum and delivering information on national pertinent governance matters, advocating for democracy, human rights and democratic governance. It delivers its activities by improving the capacity of these civil society organisations and other special interest groups. It works with community level trainers, media and relevant government agencies and other bodies. The project facilitates improved networking and coordination amongst the relevant agencies to ensure the sharing of experiences, and improved geographical as well as substantive coverage of community awareness on civic rights and responsible participation in national governance.  The project aims to create an informed, responsible and active citizenry through the dissemination of information, the communication of advocacy skills, and awareness-raising amongst the adult population of Fiji of the principles and characteristics of democracy. It does so by improving the capacity of civil society organisations on the content of civic education and on the delivery of civic education programmes through a community civic education curriculum developed jointly by the project and the partner CSOs. The Project would also enhance the participation of people in public policy development through constructive participation by activities aimed at different actors in civil society, government bodies and other special interest groups.

project_title: nice com 3 fiji good governance prog
